reviews.review_msg: I've never finished an 80 page notebook in one semester until I took a class with her. The lectures are just students copying down notes and her barely explaining them. I've never learned this little in a class before. She's an easy marker so I got a fairly good grade even though I didn't learn anything.
The worse thing is half the class is masters students, and the other half is undergrads, practice exams do not help. grades are not curved. Enjoy.
